Header.title: Traceability 4.0
Header.paragraph: Traceability converts any conventional manufacturing machine into a 4.0 manufacturing system by assisting with AI in the predictive control of production, analytics, maintenance, calibration, OEE, production. Traceability guarantees that only operators who have the proper training or certification for a process can run a machine. ​

About.paragraph: Traceability 4.0 is a module for the manufacturing industry that extracts and generates information from our machines, workstations, production operators, and automated or manual manufacturing lines. Its purpose is to improve production processes through the application of Artificial Intelligence.
Why: Detects downtime and reduces production losses
Measures and improves machine efficiency (OEE - Overall Equipment Effectiveness)
Applies data analytics on worker performance
Enables preventive and predictive maintenance using modern techniques
Why2: Provides a list of employees who arrive before the shift starts
Detects and tracks the first production part
Intelligently distributes workforce based on skills, training, and certifications
Offers a flexible platform tailored to specific needs
Leverages Artificial Intelligence in the manufacturing industry

Services.name: Flexibility
Services.text: Converts any manufacturing machine into an intelligent 4.0 system without the need to replace PLCs or controls. This provides flexibility and scalability to adapt to changing production needs and technologies.

Services.name: Calibration
Services.text: Prevents calibration expiration of all sensors, transducers, and controls of my manufacturing machines. Ensuring accurate calibration maintains precision and reliability in the production process.

Services.name: OEE
Services.text: Collects production data that helps us improve productivity and reduce downtime. By analyzing OEE (Overall Equipment Effectiveness), we can identify bottlenecks, optimize machine efficiency, and minimize production losses.

Services.name: Mantenimiento
Services.text: Supports the maintenance department with preventive, corrective, and predictive maintenance alerts, as well as documentation for troubleshooting. This ensures optimal equipment performance, minimizes downtime, and extends the lifespan of manufacturing assets.

Services.name: Production
Services.text: Detection of the time from the first production part. Tracking the time from the start of production enables us to monitor production speed, identify inefficiencies, and make informed decisions to optimize the manufacturing process.

Features.title: System Diagnosis (Health Check)
Features.text: Assess current system conditions to define priorities to address

Features.title: Process Improvement
Features.text: Information – Material Flow, Quality, Delivery, Connections, Capabilities (All cost associated with business) ​

Features.title: Implementation of Organic Technology
Features.text: ERP's embedded Machinery, Artificial Intelligence, IIoT, Traceability, Technology-based applications, Data analytics, Engineering emotions, etc..
